data.title: Next week: We can't wait to go on our first European tour with the complete original line-up of the acclaimed album “Once Around The Room –...
data.meta_description:
459 likes, 13 comments - jakobbromusic on October 17, 2023: "Next week: We can't wait to go on our first European tour with the complete original line-up of the acclaimed album “Once Around The Room – A Tribute to Paul Motian” (ECM Records): Joe Lovano, Jakob Bro, Larry Grenadier, Jorge Rossy, Anders Christensen, Thomas Morgan and Joey Baron.

24/10/2023 – Bergamo Jazz Festival, Bergamo*
26/10/2023 – MÜPA Festival, Budapest
28/10/2023 – Deutsches Jazzfestival, Frankfurt
29/10/2023 – Echternach, Luxembourg
01/11/2023 – Salle Paderewski, Lausanne
02/11/2023 – Flagey, Bruxelles
03/11/2023 – De Bijloke, Gent
04/11/2023 – So What's Next? Festival, Eindhoven
05/11/2023 – Tivoli Vredenburg, Utrecht
06/11/2023 – Malaga Jazz Festival, Malaga

“Everything is played with mastery and respect. The repertoire is round and the music brilliant. Also, it contains the best Lovano we’ve heard on a record in recent times, and that’s no small thing.” – El Pais (ES)

★★★★: “Much more than a tribute, Once Around The Room captures Motian’s spirit and walks with it to a performance that has a compelling sense of vibrant celebration as well as solemn recognition of greatness.” – Jazzwise (UK)

Footage from "Music For Black Pigeons" by Jørgen Leth and Andreas Koefoed.".
